resources.string:
This app demonstrates how to connect to the Movesense sensor.
 - First scan for BLE devices and then connect to it by clicking it on the list.
 - Clicking on connected device will subscribe to accelerometer data which is shown on screen.
 - click on "Unsubscribe" will unsubscribe from sensor data.
 - Long click on connected device will disconnect
Using movesense we could detect muscle shifts, slower breathing, heart rate drops and temperature change
We can detect the moment you start to fall asleep
We can signal You if You reach the critical zone
We can detect the tirideness of driver and give alerts to driver and fleet tracking company
100 000+ car crashes happen each year by drivers falling asleep
